# dalek.js

## install as a library

```sh
$ npm install --save dalek
``` 

## install as a binary

```sh
$ sudo npm install dalek -g

## API

```js
> var dalek = require('dalek');
undefined
undefined
> console.log(dalek);
       _____|_
      /       \
       <=====>
  Ɔ----<=====>
       =======
      c o o o Ɔ
     c o  o  o Ɔ
    c  o  o  o  Ɔ
    c__o__o__o__Ɔ
    [___________]

undefined
```
